channel.title: Mailmagazines on サトウシンヤのポートフォリオ
channel.description: Recent content in Mailmagazines on サトウシンヤのポートフォリオ

item.title: Coincheck Mailmagazine
item.description: Coincheck Normal Mailmagazine Design CONCEPT I was in charge of design and coding of the mail magazine distributed by Coincheck. I made it a simple layout with only background images and text so that it has general versatility and easy to get into the public relations that is difficult to understand technically. View

item.title: Coincheck Food Mailmagazine
item.description: Coincheck Food Mailmagazine Design CONCEPT I was in charge of design and coding of the mail magazine distributed by Coincheck. This was an e-mail magazine mainly for cultivating restaurants, so I used images that illustrate eating and drinking in illustrations. I also instructed Illustrator of outsourcing by myself. View

item.title: Coincheck Payment Mailmagazine
item.description: Coincheck Payment Mailmagazine Design CONCEPT I was in charge of design and coding of the mail magazine distributed by Coincheck. This was mainly a banner to promote multi-store settlement of bit coins (shopping, electric payment, other life infrastructure), so I assumed an image that is doing shopping happily with bit coin. I also instructed the illustrator of outsourcing by myself. View
